snippetFileBasedDataRetrievalCode:
# Load the downloaded CSV file from the DC Wizard
acquired_data <- read.csv("dcw_data.csv", header=T)

# Merge the two data frames using the appropriate column names
merged_data <- left_join(<YOUR_DATA_FRAME>, acquired_data, by=c("<YOUR_COLUMN_NAME>"="$INDEX_VARIABLE_NAME"))
snippetApiBasedDataRetrievalCode:
# Get the latest statistical data from DataCommons.org
locations <- c($INDEX_VARIABLE_VALUES)
statvars <- c($DC_VARIABLE_NAMES)
acquired_data <- latest_statistical_data(locations, location_type = "$LOCATION_TYPE", statvars)

# Merge the two data frames using the appropriate column names
merged_data <- left_join(<YOUR_DATA_FRAME>, acquired_data, by=c("<YOUR_COLUMN_NAME>"="geoName"))
